verses.text: When the \sc Lord\sc* turned again the captivity of Zion, We were like them that dream.
Then was our mouth filled \add with\add* laughter, And our tongue \add with\add* singing: Then said they among the heathen, The \sc Lord\sc* hath done great things for them.
The \sc Lord\sc* hath done great things for us; \add Whereof\add* we are glad.
Turn again our captivity, O \sc Lord\sc*, As the streams in the south.
They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, Shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves \add with him\add*.
